original_title: DJ Rob Swift: Live! The Documented Movement
overview: DJ Rob Swift: Live! The Documented Movement is a behind the scenes look at one of the trail blazers of the DJ world, Rob Swift, as he embarks on a world tour to promote his ground breaking album The Architect. Special guests The X-ecutioners, Breez Evahflowin and The Buck 50 Kutters join forces with Rob on his never ending quest to prove the turntable is a musical instrument.
title: DJ Rob Swift: Live! The Documented Movement
